Package com.fssa.freshnest.validation

Class InviteValidator

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.freshnest.validation.InviteValidator
public class InviteValidator extends Object
This class provides methods to validate invite-related data and operations.
Author:
SusikumarPitchaimuth

    • validateInviteCreate

      public static boolean validateInviteCreate(Invite invite) throws InvalidUserException
      Validates the data for creating an invite.
      Parameters:
      invite - The Invite object for creating the invite.
      Returns:
      True if the invite data is valid, otherwise throws InvalidUserException.
      Throws:
      InvalidUserException - If the invite data is invalid.

    • validateInviteRead

      public static boolean validateInviteRead(Invite invite) throws InvalidUserException
      Parameters:
      invite - The invite object containing the user id to read their invitation.
      Returns:
      True if the invite data is valid, otherwise throws InvalidUserException.
      Throws:
      InvalidUserException - If the invite data is invalid.
